prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
### 1. Prioritize Tasks

Prioritize your tasks each day by focusing on the most important and urgent tasks first. This ensures you tackle the highest priority items when your energy levels are highest.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Prioritize, tasks, important, urgent, energy levels, focus
